statements: UPDATE retirement_account SET balance = 5000 WHERE account_id = 1003;
UPDATE retirement_account SET threshold = 1000, user_id = 2005 WHERE account_id = 1007;
UPDATE retirement_account SET balance = 5000.00, threshold = 1000.00 WHERE account_id = 1234
UPDATE retirement_account SET user_id = 5678, threshold = 1500.00, balance = 6000.00 WHERE user_id = 9876
UPDATE UserRetirementAccount SET alert_threshold = 5000 WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE AlertLog SET alert_message = 'Low account balance' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE UserRetirementAccount SET account_balance = 15000, alert_threshold = 500 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE AlertLog SET alert_message = 'Account balance below threshold' WHERE user_id = 123 AND alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE notifications SET notification_date = '2022-09-15 09:30:00' WHERE notification_id = 201;
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET balance = balance + 500.25 WHERE account_id = 100
UPDATE notifications SET notification_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE account_id = 200 AND threshold_id = 1
UPDATE RetirementAccount SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE Notification SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = 456;
UPDATE RetirementAccount SET balance = balance + 100, threshold = 500 WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE Notification SET message = 'New message', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE notification_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET retire_account_balance = 5000.00 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE thresholds SET notification_message = 'Threshold reached, please take action' WHERE threshold_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET retire_account_balance = retire_account_balance + 1000 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, user_id = 456 WHERE alert_id = 789;
